name: Le Taj Sweet Potato & Spinach Dahl
description: A fresh look at a classic Indian dish, this is a great source of protein, and it’s vegan as well!
preparation: In a large pan, over medium heat, combine Toasted Onion, curry, lentils, potatoes, tomatoes, and Bouillon. Season with Sea Salt, and bring to a simmer over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until lentils and potatoes are tender, 20–25 minutes. Add extra Bouillon if required.
Add spinach and Le Taj Sauce, and cook briefly, until heated through.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve over rice, quinoa, or bulgar.
